itemlist.caption: Spider Man: Home Coming
itemlist.description: A 2017 American superhero film based on the Marvel Comics character Spider-Man.

itemlist.caption: Multiverse of Madness
itemlist.description: A 2022 superhero film, based on the Marvel Comics superhero Doctor Strange.

itemlist.caption: Black Panther
itemlist.description: Black Panther is the first protagonist of African descent in mainstream American comics.

itemlist.caption: Avengers: Age of Ultron
itemlist.description: Avengers Age of Ultron is a 2015 superhero film, based on the Marvel Comics.

itemlist.caption: Thor: The Dark World
itemlist.description: Thor: The Dark World is a 2013 American superhero film based on the Marvel Comics character.

itemlist.caption: Captain America: Civil War
itemlist.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

itemlist.caption: The Incredible Hulk
itemlist.description: Bruce Banner becomes the Hulk as an unwitting pawn in a military scheme to reinvigorate the 'Super-Soldier' program through gamma radiation.

itemlist.caption: Doctor Strange
itemlist.description: Doctor Strange is a fictional practicing sorcerer who draws his powers from mystical entities such as Agamotto, Cyttorak.

itemlist.caption: Avengers: End Game
itemlist.description: The Avengers must assemble once more in order to undo Thanos's actions and undo the chaos to the universe.no matter what consequences may be in store.

itemlist.caption: Avengers: Infinity War
itemlist.description: The Avengers and the Guardians of the Galaxy attempt to prevent Thanos from collecting the six all-powerful Infinity Stones.
